title: vEdapurIshvaram bhajarE
sahitya:
vEdapurIshvaram bhajarE rE citta vEdAgamAdi sannuta vaibhavam


anupallavi

 vidhIndra sannuta vinOda caraNam vimala guruguhOpacAriNam


caraNam   nAdabindu kalAspadam shankaram nandi turagArOhitam varam candrashEkharam
sadAnanda karam carmAmbara dharam caturatara karam mAdhavAdyamara brnda ghOSitam
mArakOTi kOTi prakAshitam mahEshvaram tribhuvanEshvaram prasiddha triputa sundarI samEtam
